titles.title: Domestic Spirits Tax Equity Act of 2005

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue code of 1986 to allow distilled spirits wholesalers a credit against income tax for their cost of carrying Federal excise taxes prior to the sale of the product bearing the tax.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 3/17/2005--Introduced. Domestic Spirits Tax Equity Act of 2005 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow wholesalers of distilled spirits a business tax credit for the financing costs of the Federal excise tax on such spirits.
